TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit SqlBulkCopyColumnMapping extends System.Object

summary.span: 定義 執行個體 (instance) 之資料來源中資料行，與執行個體之目的資料表中資料行間的對應。

span.span: Defines the mapping between a column in a instance's data source and a column in the instance's destination table.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 資料行對應會定義資料來源和目標資料表之間的對應。Column mappings define the mapping between data source and the target table. 如果未定義對應 — 也就是集合是空的資料行的序數位置上對應隱含型。If mappings are not defined—that is, the collection is empty—the columns are mapped implicitly based on ordinal position. 針對此目的，必須符合來源和目標結構描述。For this to work, source and target schemas must match. 如果沒有的話，就會擲回。If they do not, an will be thrown. 如果集合不是空的指定已存在於資料來源不是每個資料行。If the collection is not empty, not every column present in the data source has to be specified. 未對應的集合都會被忽略。Those not mapped by the collection are ignored. 您可以依名稱或序數參考到來源和目標資料行。You can refer to source and target columns by either name or ordinal. 您也可以混用依名稱和相同的對應集合中的 order by 序數資料行參考。You can also mix by-name and by-ordinal column references in the same mappings collection. ## Examples 下列範例會大量複製資料從來源資料表中**AdventureWorks**相同資料庫中的目的地資料表的範例資料庫。The following example bulk copies data from a source table in the **AdventureWorks** sample database to a destination table in the same database. 雖然目的地資料行數目符合來源中的資料行數目，而且每個目的地資料行是在相同的序數位置做為其對應的來源資料行，資料行名稱不相符。Although the number of columns in the destination matches the number of columns in the source, and each destination column is in the same ordinal position as its corresponding source column, the column names do not match. 物件可用來建立大量複製的資料行對應。 objects are used to create a column map for the bulk copy. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此範例不會執行，除非您已建立工作資料表中所述[大量複製範例設定](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sql/bulk-copy-example-setup.md)。This sample will not run unless you have created the work tables as described in [Bulk Copy Example Setup](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sql/bulk-copy-example-setup.md). 此程式碼可示範如何使用的語法**SqlBulkCopy**只。This code is provided to demonstrate the syntax for using **SqlBulkCopy** only. 如果來源和目的地資料表位於相同的 SQL Server 執行個體，則您更輕鬆且快速地使用 Transact SQL`INSERT … SELECT`陳述式來複製資料。If the source and destination tables are in the same SQL Server instance, it is easier and faster to use a Transact-SQL `INSERT … SELECT` statement to copy the data. [!code-csharp[DataWorks SqlBulkCopy.ColumnMapping#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks SqlBulkCopy.ColumnMapping/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DataWorks SqlBulkCopy.ColumnMapping#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks SqlBulkCopy.ColumnMapping/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化新 物件的預設建構函式。

span.span: Default constructor that initializes a new object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果您使用這個建構函式，您必須再定義的來源對應使用屬性或屬性，並定義對應的使用目的屬性或屬性。If you use this constructor, you must then define the source for the mapping using the property or the property, and define the destination for the mapping using the property or the property. ## Examples 下列範例會大量複製資料從來源資料表中**AdventureWorks**相同資料庫中的目的地資料表的範例資料庫。The following example bulk copies data from a source table in the **AdventureWorks** sample database to a destination table in the same database. 雖然在來源中的資料行數目相符目的地資料行的數目，資料行名稱和序數位置並不相符。Although the number of columns in the destination matches the number of columns in the source, the column names and ordinal positions do not match. 物件可用來建立大量複製的資料行對應。 objects are used to create a column map for the bulk copy. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此範例不會執行，除非您已建立工作資料表中所述[大量複製範例設定](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sql/bulk-copy-example-setup.md)。This sample will not run unless you have created the work tables as described in [Bulk Copy Example Setup](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sql/bulk-copy-example-setup.md). 此程式碼可示範如何使用的語法**SqlBulkCopy**只。This code is provided to demonstrate the syntax for using **SqlBulkCopy** only. 如果來源和目的地資料表位於相同的 SQL Server 執行個體，則您更輕鬆且快速地使用 Transact SQL`INSERT … SELECT`陳述式來複製資料。If the source and destination tables are in the same SQL Server instance, it is easier and faster to use a Transact-SQL `INSERT … SELECT` statement to copy the data. [!code-csharp[DataWorks SqlBulkCopy.ColumnMapping#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks SqlBulkCopy.ColumnMapping/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DataWorks SqlBulkCopy.ColumnMapping#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks SqlBulkCopy.ColumnMapping/VB/source.vb#1)]

param.span: 目的資料表中目的資料行的序數位置。

summary.span: 建立新的資料行對應，使用資料行序數參考來源和目的資料行。

span.span: Creates a new column mapping, using column ordinals to refer to source and destination columns.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列範例會大量複製資料從來源資料表中**AdventureWorks**相同資料庫中的目的地資料表的範例資料庫。The following example bulk copies data from a source table in the **AdventureWorks** sample database to a destination table in the same database. 雖然在來源中的資料行數目相符目的地資料行的數目，資料行名稱和序數位置並不相符。Although the number of columns in the destination matches the number of columns in the source, the column names and ordinal positions do not match. 物件可用來建立資料行的序數位置為基礎的大量複製的資料行對應。 objects are used to create a column map for the bulk copy based on the ordinal positions of the columns. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此範例不會執行，除非您已建立工作資料表中所述[大量複製範例設定](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sql/bulk-copy-example-setup.md)。This sample will not run unless you have created the work tables as described in [Bulk Copy Example Setup](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sql/bulk-copy-example-setup.md). 此程式碼可示範如何使用的語法**SqlBulkCopy**只。This code is provided to demonstrate the syntax for using **SqlBulkCopy** only. 如果來源和目的地資料表位於相同的 SQL Server 執行個體，則您更輕鬆且快速地使用 Transact SQL`INSERT … SELECT`陳述式來複製資料。If the source and destination tables are in the same SQL Server instance, it is easier and faster to use a Transact-SQL `INSERT … SELECT` statement to copy the data. [!code-csharp[DataWorks SqlBulkCopy.ColumnMappingOrdinal#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks SqlBulkCopy.ColumnMappingOrdinal/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DataWorks SqlBulkCopy.ColumnMappingOrdinal#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks SqlBulkCopy.ColumnMappingOrdinal/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 建立新的資料行對應，使用資料行序數參考來源資料行和目標資料行的資料行名稱。

span.span: Creates a new column mapping, using a column ordinal to refer to the source column and a column name for the target column.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ DestinationColumn { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 目的資料庫資料表中正在對應的資料行名稱。

span.span: Name of the column being mapped in the destination database table.
The string value of the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 和屬性互斥。The and properties are mutually exclusive. 最後一個值將會優先採用。The last value set takes precedence. ## Examples 下列範例會大量複製資料從來源資料表中**AdventureWorks**相同資料庫中的目的地資料表的範例資料庫。The following example bulk copies data from a source table in the **AdventureWorks** sample database to a destination table in the same database. 雖然在來源中的資料行數目相符目的地資料行的數目，資料行名稱和序數位置並不相符。Although the number of columns in the destination matches the number of columns in the source, the column names and ordinal positions do not match. 物件可用來建立大量複製的資料行對應。 objects are used to create a column map for the bulk copy. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此範例不會執行，除非您已建立工作資料表中所述[大量複製範例設定](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sql/bulk-copy-example-setup.md)。This sample will not run unless you have created the work tables as described in [Bulk Copy Example Setup](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sql/bulk-copy-example-setup.md). 此程式碼可示範如何使用的語法**SqlBulkCopy**只。This code is provided to demonstrate the syntax for using **SqlBulkCopy** only. 如果來源和目的地資料表位於相同的 SQL Server 執行個體，則您更輕鬆且快速地使用 Transact SQL`INSERT … SELECT`陳述式來複製資料。If the source and destination tables are in the same SQL Server instance, it is easier and faster to use a Transact-SQL `INSERT … SELECT` statement to copy the data. [!code-csharp[DataWorks SqlBulkCopy.ColumnMappingDestinationColumn#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks SqlBulkCopy.ColumnMappingDestinationColumn/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DataWorks SqlBulkCopy.ColumnMappingDestinationColumn#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks SqlBulkCopy.ColumnMappingDestinationColumn/VB/source.vb#1)]

span.span: The ordinal position of the source column within the data source.
The integer value of the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 和屬性互斥。The and properties are mutually exclusive. 最後一個值將會優先採用。The last value set takes precedence. ## Examples 下列範例會大量複製資料從來源資料表中**AdventureWorks**相同資料庫中的目的地資料表的範例資料庫。The following example bulk copies data from a source table in the **AdventureWorks** sample database to a destination table in the same database. 雖然在來源中的資料行數目相符目的地資料行的數目，資料行名稱和序數位置並不相符。Although the number of columns in the destination matches the number of columns in the source, the column names and ordinal positions do not match. 物件可用來建立大量複製的資料行對應。 objects are used to create a column map for the bulk copy. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此範例不會執行，除非您已建立工作資料表中所述[大量複製範例設定](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sql/bulk-copy-example-setup.md)。This sample will not run unless you have created the work tables as described in [Bulk Copy Example Setup](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sql/bulk-copy-example-setup.md). 此程式碼可示範如何使用的語法**SqlBulkCopy**只。This code is provided to demonstrate the syntax for using **SqlBulkCopy** only. 如果來源和目的地資料表位於相同的 SQL Server 執行個體，則您更輕鬆且快速地使用 Transact SQL`INSERT … SELECT`陳述式來複製資料。If the source and destination tables are in the same SQL Server instance, it is easier and faster to use a Transact-SQL `INSERT … SELECT` statement to copy the data. [!code-csharp[DataWorks SqlBulkCopy.ColumnMappingDestinationOrdinal#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks SqlBulkCopy.ColumnMappingDestinationOrdinal/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DataWorks SqlBulkCopy.ColumnMappingDestinationOrdinal#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks SqlBulkCopy.ColumnMappingDestinationOrdinal/VB/source.vb#1)]
